greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists n terms, starting with n^3 + n - 1, such that the difference between successive terms is equal to n^3 - 1 = A068601(n).
comment: Note that the last term of the n-th row is the fourth power of n, A000583(n).
See also the triangles of A162614 and A162615.
formula: Row sums: n*(n^2 + n - 1)*(n^2+1)/2. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 20 2009
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 12 2009
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 05 2010
